data.name: Notmads
data.detailed_description:
You are a mage that controls a giant beast where you can build your home while you explore and discover the fantastic open world of Notmads. You have to level up and use your magic to improve and protect your beast because you are not alone in this world, there are foes who want to destroy you.

Control the beast!

Possess your beast and move it however you like until you define its course adjusting its forward and angular speed. The beast has its own level, stats, equipment and skills.

Your home is everywhere!

Your beast has a platform on top and that is where your house is built.

Home sweet home

Build your dream house on top of your beast using the wide variety of parts available. You can also protect it by creating defensive buildings like turrets.

Watch your back!

Enemies will try to destroy your beast, so try to keep him moving to avoid attacks, there are zones where the danger level is higher and attacks are more frequent.

Skills

Skills are items that you can equip and change at will. They have different base stats and they can level up while you use them. You cannot use all skills at once so you have to think smart when making your skill sets, it can be complicated to add/remove skills to your skill set while you are in a middle of a fight! There are offensive, defensive and passive skills, and some skills can only be used by your beast!

Online co-op

Explore dungeons, kill enemies and protect your beast with the help of your friends! Enjoy the entire game experience with them, including the main campaign!

Dungeons!

Explore the dungeons while your beast keeps going wherever you want, but don't forget to protect it by adding defense buildings such as turrets and use this to your advantage to avoid leaving the dungeon in case of an enemy attack.

Loot!

Kill enemies and loot items with different rarity types!

Story mode

The game will have a main campaign, but it will not be available until the game leaves early access.

Level up and use your magic to improve and protect your beast because you are not alone in this world, there are foes who want to destroy you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
